alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 9:43PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Smith, southeastern Franklin and southwestern Webster Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 943 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Riverton, or 33 miles northeast of Phillipsburg, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Riverton and Inavale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
